main event: On 31 March 1966, a partially unidentified flying object was sighted by two observers in Columbus, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was first observed at approximately 2150 hours EST and was under observation for about 10 minutes,The object appeared to be quite large with four lights around the periphery and one larger light in the center,It was observed to be hovering and moving slowly in an erratic manner,The witnesses included Mr. and Mrs. Columbus, who reported sighting a bright light in the sky while driving,One witness described the object as having a reddish bright light and a silvery outer ring.
sighted object: partially unidentified flying object with lights
